availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Carroll County, Kentucky on July 30, 1830. In 1860, he was a book keeper. Registered for the Union draft on August 1863. Died in Louisville, Kentucky on February 1, 1912.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "James R.Jackman (July 20, 1830 - February 1, 1912)," Memorial #18573723, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=18573723&ref=acom (accessed June 26, 2017).; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 74. Civil War Draft Registration Records (1863), Kentucky, 4th Congressional District, Nelson County, p. 261.
